name: Omega Reaction
description: Fend off wave after wave of enemies as you fight to victory in this twin stick shooter. Fast shooting guns, plus your ship's additional powerful capabilities help you fight through progressively more difficult levels, in order to escape and make your way home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: Keyboard/Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: XBox 360 Controller supported but optional
